Edible Landscaping Internship Greenhouse

About

Student interns of the Edible Landscaping Internship propagate plants for several edible landscapes on campus and for Arboretum plant sales. Currently, these edible plants are propagated at the Environmental Horticulture greenhouses.

Get Involved

Get involved propagating edible plants through the Arboretum and Public Gardenâ€™s Edible Landscaping Internship, by attending workdays or applying to be an intern.

What's Growing

Tomatoes, spinach, lettuce, chard, eggplant, cilantro, amaranth, beets, basil, peppers, chives, and more!
